lead_paragraph: As if Lewis Hamilton did not have enough on his plate already, with two successive engine failures and Mercedes team mate Nico Rosberg on a seven-race winning streak, the Formula One champion now has the stewards to worry about as well.

headline.print_headline: Engine Failures and Reprimands Add to Hamilton's Woes
headline.main: Engine Failures and Reprimands Add to Hamilton's Woes

snippet: As if Lewis Hamilton did not have enough on his plate already, with two successive engine failures and Mercedes team mate Nico Rosberg on a seven-race winning streak, the Formula One champion now has the stewards to worry about as well....
